dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3245204H] fraudulent website / second mail
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

PS. Please note that there is no attachment to this e-mail. 

-----Original Message-----
From: Abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:Abuse@ev1servers.net] 
Sent: Monday, February 26, 2007 7:50 PM
To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3245204H] fraudulent website / second mail

This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
MIME element (text/plain) 
to whom it may concern, 
 
in additition to our former mail, where You replied to and asked for the

complete DMCA for copyrighted material, here's some more.  On our  
website eb-video.com we have detailed 
proof that we are the owners of the material. EB-Video com watersports 
productions. Also we have attached to this mail various pages of their 
website where they offer our products. Within the films there are also 
our copyrightremarks. 
 
So You either take that site "gayscatcinema" of the server, or you'll  
just be enclosed in the legal procedures to follow, thats up to you. 
 
Below all the information you'll need. Plus attachments 
 
Kind regards 
 
Gilbert 
eb-Video ( E & R scp.) 
 
 
 
 
 
o whom it may concern and who is affected, 
 
we are the owners of EB-Video.com, E & R scp., in Spain. 
 
On your website gayscatcinema.com we have discovered several eb-video 
productions 
that are copyrighted by us - eb-video.com ( E & R scp., Spain). 
 
We have made various captures, sent you those in a separate mail, but in

case your 
server blocks those mails as considered spam here the mail comes without

the captures again. 
The films are: 
 
P.Games    No.  3019 
SkinMaker No. 3020 
Heaven       No.  3021 
P.United     No.  3022 
P-Casting    No. 3023 
 
You offer them either to download for special prices or even as DVD and 
DVD-packages. 
As you may imagine we were not delighted finding our valuable 
productions right there on 
the sales counter of your website;  so we checked further for as many 
informations to gather 
as possible. 
 
To make a long story short we ask you to immediately remove all content 
regarding eb-video 
altered or in orginal formats, in film or in pictures from all of your 
websites or shoppinglists. 
Alternatively we offer you to keep on selling the films via download for

a monthly charge of 
500 Euro - minimum 1 year (12months) fixed guaranteed.  The sales of 
DVDs or other hardware 
products is not allowed, unless you have purchased the original DVDs 
from us. 
 
Please be so kind and make your decision within the next couple of days.

Otherwise 
we will not hesitate to forward all information we have gathered so far 
to your local 
plus federal authorities in all countries you have chosen to reside. 
This would not be the first time during the last 7 years.  So we can 
just recommend you 
not to try tricks on us now or in the future.  At the bottom of this 
mail we have added 
contact-addresses etc. 
 
Expecting an immediate reaction 
 
sincerely 
 
Gilbert 
eb-video.com  ( E & R scp., Spain)        18.02.2007
